description: Detects a highly relevant Antivirus alert that reports a hack tool or other attack tool Author: Florian Roth. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Antivirus Hacktool Detection
query: (winlog.event_data.Signature:(HTOOL* OR HKTL* OR SecurityTool* OR ATK\/*) OR winlog.event_data.Signature:*Hacktool*)
